segments.text: I'll tell you something that's good about action movies . The special effects are great !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But they are so silly ! They're not art !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's just your personal prejudice . Do you know who was the director of the movie Titanic ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , did you know he was also the director of The Terminator ?
segments.speaker: S1
